t: Whole Foods Rebrands House Coffee Line, Drops Allegro Name
s: September 9, 2024 - In 2015, Whole Foods and the Allegro business unit introduced a new brand called Allegro Coffee Roasters, which involved opening micro roasteries and branded cafes inside Whole Foods stores. Those locations — including spots in the Denver and Bay Area markets — have all closed since Amazon’s ...
